name: Link-api
tagline: A Simple Link Storage and Retrieval API - AKA Bookmark
body: Link-API ======== A Simple Link Retrieval API - AKA Bookmark Keeping a curated set of your favorite links is a great way to keep track of interesting sites and content. This simple sample provides a basic Links API option as well as a more advanced (but only mildly) option. Use RAW link(s) for Creating Virtual APIs Basic Option - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DevTestSolutions/Link-API/master/link-api.raml Advanced Option - https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DevTestSolutions/Link-API/master/link-api-advanced.raml Goto https://vapi.ca.com to create your own Link API from these sample files.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
